title: Lecture 14
content: <document version="2.0"><file url="https://static.us.edusercontent.com/files/xNGOdEwaHMuPn90WywUlLrJI" filename="Lecture 14.pdf"/><paragraph>This is for discussing basic RNNs and the start of self-supervision. </paragraph></document>
document: This is for discussing basic RNNs and the start of self-supervision.

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Sharing my notes for Lectures 14. I focused on adding intuition and the "why" behind the concepts, closely follows the lecture. Also, have attached a marked up version of Professor Sahai's original lecture notes, adding key points/connections I found most important during the lecture.</paragraph><paragraph>I am happy to share the LaTeX source. Also, if you catch any errors/ want a specific section expanded, just let me know and I'll update it!</paragraph><paragraph>Note: I used an LLM to create the initial structure, but then manually refined and corrected the content through multiple iterations while watching the lectures.</paragraph><paragraph>Hope this helps everyone save some time!</paragraph><file url="https://static.us.edusercontent.com/files/1hTChdUSfaTqGUzFX4J5mANh" filename="Notes_Lec_14.pdf"/></document>
comments.document:
Sharing my notes for Lectures 14. I focused on adding intuition and the "why" behind the concepts, closely follows the lecture. Also, have attached a marked up version of Professor Sahai's original lecture notes, adding key points/connections I found most important during the lecture.

I am happy to share the LaTeX source. Also, if you catch any errors/ want a specific section expanded, just let me know and I'll update it!

Note: I used an LLM to create the initial structure, but then manually refined and corrected the content through multiple iterations while watching the lectures.

Hope this helps everyone save some time!

comments.content: <document version="2.0"><paragraph>Sharing my notes for Lectures 14 & 15</paragraph><paragraph>Note: I combined my own class notes with the lecture slides and used an LLM to help generate the final summary.</paragraph><paragraph>Hope this is helpful!</paragraph><file url="https://static.us.edusercontent.com/files/d2VrJ4wsipBS6JjoqW5Dq1yc" filename="lec14-15_RNN_chatgpt.pdf"/></document>
comments.document:
Sharing my notes for Lectures 14 & 15

Note: I combined my own class notes with the lecture slides and used an LLM to help generate the final summary.

Hope this is helpful!
